scripts.data:clean: rimraf data/src data/exported && cd data/ && mkdir src && mkdir exported
scripts.copy:us: mv 'D:/DOWNLOADS/CHROME/Retail Calendar - CURRENT.tsv' ./data/src/us-current.tsv && mv 'D:/DOWNLOADS/CHROME/Retail Calendar - NEW.tsv' ./data/src/us-new.tsv
scripts.import:us: babel-node src/js/tsv2json data/src/us-current.tsv data/src/us-current.json && babel-node src/js/tsv2json data/src/us-new.tsv data/src/us-new.json
scripts.prep: yarn data:clean && yarn prep:cala && yarn prep:us
scripts.events:create: curl http://marriottcalendar.local/events-cache.php?region=all && curl http://marriottcalendar.local/events-cache.php?region=cala && curl http://marriottcalendar.local/events-cache.php?region=portfolio && curl http://marriottcalendar.local/events-cache.php?region=us-west && curl http://marriottcalendar.local/events-cache.php?region=us-east && curl http://marriottcalendar.local/events-cache.php?region=canada && curl http://marriottcalendar.local/events-cache.php?region=brand && curl http://marriottcalendar.local/events-cache.php?region=loyalty && curl http://marriottcalendar.local/events-cache.php?region=hawaii && curl http://marriottcalendar.local/events-cache.php?region=promotion
scripts.one-click: yarn prep && yarn fix:cala && yarn fix:us && yarn merge && yarn export && yarn events:create
